sys_script_include.description:
Implements extension point x_bn.CanReserve This Extension Point handles the decision for whether a particular type of Thing can be reserved. Implementations must provide two methods:
"canReserve" method that takes in four arguments (below) and returns a boolean: GlideRecord for a Thing to be reserved GlideDateTime representing the requested start date of the reservation GlideDateTime representing the requested end date of the reservation User object representing the User making the request "handles" method that takes in a single argument (below) and returns a boolean: GlideRecord representing the Thing to be reserved
sys_script_include.name: CanReserveDivvy
